      Creates a tournament provider and returns its ID Implementation Notes : Providers will need to call this endpoint first to register their callback URL and their API key with the tournament system before any other tournament provider endpoints will work.

    • Method Detail

      • createCodes

        retrofit2.Call<java.util.List> createCodes(TournamentCodeParameters tournamentCodeParameters,
                                           int count,
                                           long tournamentId)

        Create a tournament code for the given tournament

        Parameters:
        tournamentCodeParameters - Metadata for the generated code
        count - The number of codes to create (max 1000)
        tournamentId - The tournament ID
        Returns:
        Requested list of code created for the tournament

      • updateCodes

                                        long tournamentId)

        Parameters:
        tournamentCodeUpdateParameters - The fields to update
        tournamentId - The tournament ID

      • getTournamentInfoByTournamentId

        retrofit2.Call<fr.nspu.riot.api.models.TournamentCode> getTournamentInfoByTournamentId(java.lang.String tournamentCode,
                                                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)

        Returns the tournament code DTO(class TournamentCode) associated with a tournament code string.

        Parameters:
        tournamentCode - The short code to look up lobby events for
        options - Optional parameters. Nullable
        Returns:
        Call requested tournament info class TournamentCode
        See Also:
        class TournamentCode

      • createProvider

        retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Integer> createProvider(ProviderRegistrationParameters providerRegistrationParameters)

        Creates a tournament provider and returns its ID Implementation Notes : Providers will need to call this endpoint first to register their callback URL and their API key with the tournament system before any other tournament provider endpoints will work.

        Parameters:
        providerRegistrationParameters - The provider definition.
        Returns:
        Requested id
